problem.markdown:
>>1) What is Dermatoglyphics?<< (x) is the study of the ridge patterns of the skin of the fingers, palms, toes and soles ( ) is the study of the hairs and sebaceous (oil) glands ( ) is the study of palmar and planter ( ) none of above
>>2) How to calculate Pattern Intensity Index on the basis of frequency distribution?<< ( ) Whorls x 100/loops ( ) Arches x 100/Whorls (x) 2 x Whorls + Loops/n ( ) 2xwhorls x 100/loops
>>3) In which type of population arches appears in very small numbers?<< ( ) Caucasoid (x) Mongoloid ( ) Negroid ( ) None of above
>>4) What is the percentage of whorls in Caucasoid?<< (x) 30 to 40 ( ) 40 to 50 ( ) 10 to 20 ( ) 20 to 30
>>5) Who classified the various finger patterns into four main types?<< (x) Henry ( ) Galton ( ) Schmidt ( ) W H River
>>6) Dermatoglyphic traits are not modified by environmental factors.<< (x) True ( ) false
>>7) The __________ are more concerned in establishing variations in respect of traits among different human populations.<< (x) Anthropologist ( ) Archeologist ( ) Dermatologist ( ) Geographical Statistician
>>8) In which era finger patterns were used for personal identification?<< ( ) New age ( ) Pagan (x) Christian era ( ) Prehistoric era

is the study of the hairs and sebaceous (oil) glands
is the study of palmar and planter
